title: Nigel Farage says Keir Starmer will be gone by the end of the month as he sticks the boot in on PM: ‘Game’s up mate!’
tags: Labour councillor delivers bleak verdict for Keir Starmer as Cabinet rallies behind PM;Nigel Farage puts Reform on ‘general election war footing’ as PM’s premiership on the brink;Reform boss tears into 'toxic' Keir Starmer as pressure mounts to resign: 'Britons have had enough!';The GB News Editorial Charter
